algorithm_technique: Iterate through each cell, calculate average of neighbors within bounds.
problem_summary_simple: Smooth an image by averaging each pixel with its neighbors.
problem_summary_technical: Apply a 3x3 kernel to each pixel, averaging valid neighbors, and rounding down.
key_insights: The core logic involves iterating through each cell and its 8 neighbors.
Boundary conditions are crucial to avoid index out of bounds errors.
Integer division naturally handles the floor operation required.
